content:
I went through the complete SmartOnFhir spec. It really improved.
It is also a lot longer which makes navigation a bit tricky.

I've copied the specification in a word document and added my remarks as comments. Most of them are editorial, there are a couple that are more content related. I suggest that we discuss the document before we file Jira tickets. This will save everybody a lot of work.

SmartOnFhir-v2.docx

I've read through your comments @Bas van den Heuvel -- really appreciate your close read, as always. Please see https://docs.google.com/document/d/16sR6bMSz8XGNwIy2fFiLGJsBiW0kVqHE/edit for a full set of notes, and:

  • https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/smart-app-launch/branches/bas1/ which incorporates dozens of fixes from your write-up doc (all the ones I responded to with bas1 in the comment response
  • FHIR-34170 for discussion on FHIR-I today, to incorporate these fixes
  • https://github.com/HL7/smart-app-launch/pull/375/files is a rendering of the diff
